      • createEvent

        public void createEvent(java.lang.String speakerName,
                        java.time.Instant eventTime,
                        java.lang.String eventName,
                        java.lang.String room,
                        int capacity)
        Defines a new event with the details speaker's name, event time, event name, room, and capacity. Adds this event to the collection of all events.
        Parameters:
        speakerName - Name of the speaker for the event.
        eventTime - Time that the event takes place.
        eventName - Name of the event.
        room - Room which the event is being held in.
        capacity - Maximum capacity of the event.

      • deleteEvent

        public void deleteEvent(java.lang.String eventId)
        Deletes the event identified by an event ID from the collection of all events.
        Parameters:
        eventId - ID of the selected event.

        Registers the user with a given username in the event identified by an event ID.
        Parameters:
        eventID - ID of the selected event.
        userName - Username of the current user.

      • dropUser

        public void dropUser(java.lang.String eventID,
                     java.lang.String userName)
        Withdraws the user with a given username from the event identified by an event ID.
        Parameters:
        eventID - ID of the selected event.
        userName - Username of the current user.

      • isEventFull

        public boolean isEventFull(java.lang.String eventID)
        Returns a boolean to identify if the event reaches its capacity.
        Parameters:
        eventID - ID of the selected event.
        Returns:
        False if the event does not reach its capacity. True if the event is full.

      • eventExists

        public boolean eventExists(java.lang.String eventID)
        Returns a boolean to identify if the event exists.
        Parameters:
        eventID - ID of the selected event.
        Returns:
        False if the event does not exist. True if the event exists.

      • addEventToHash

        public void addEventToHash(Event event)

      • checkUserInEvent

        public boolean checkUserInEvent(java.time.Instant timeslot,
                                java.lang.String username)
        Returns a boolean to identify if a user is enrolled in any event during a specific time slot.
        Parameters:
        timeslot - A starting time of a time slot.
        username - Username of the current user.
        Returns:
        False if the user is not enrolled in any event during the time slot. True if the user is enrolled in some events during the time slot.

      • checkConflictSpeaker

        public boolean checkConflictSpeaker(java.time.Instant timeSlot,
                                    java.lang.String username)
        Returns a boolean to identify if a speaker is holding any event during a specific time slot.
        Parameters:
        timeSlot - A starting time of a time slot.
        username - Username of the speaker.
        Returns:
        False if the speaker is not holding any event during the time slot. True if the speaker is holding some events during the time slot.

      • checkRoom

        public boolean checkRoom(java.time.Instant timeslot,
                         java.lang.String room)
        Returns a boolean to identify if a room is in use during a specific time slot.
        Parameters:
        timeslot - A starting time of a time slot.
        room - A room name that is chosen.
        Returns:
        False if the room is not in use during the time slot. True if the room is in use during the time slot.

        Parameters:
        username - Username of the current user.
        Returns:
        A list of events' IDs.

      • getAllEventData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getAllEventData()
        Returns all information about all events stored in events hashmap in EventManager.
        Returns:
        An arraylist of String[]. Each String[] contains information of one event stored in events hashmap in EventManager.

      • getSingleEventData

        public java.lang.String[] getSingleEventData(java.lang.String id)
        Returns all information of the given event that's stored in events hashmap in EventManager.
        Parameters:
        id - event id
        Returns:
        A String[] that contains information of one event stored in events hashmap, including event id, speaker's name, time, event name, participants, room number, and capacity.

      • setEventData

        public void setEventData(java.lang.String[] eventData)
        Store the event data of an event in EventManager.
        Parameters:
        eventData - A string containing all datas of one event including event id, speaker's name, time, event name, participants, room number, and capacity.

      • getFormattedEvent

        public java.lang.String getFormattedEvent(java.lang.String id)
        Returns a string representation of an event.
        Parameters:
        id - Event id
        Returns:
        A string containing the given event's name time, room and capacity.
